page.title: 01CONTENTS
page.content: Settlement in our block consists of 3 villages - Smalley (in squares 1,2 & 5), Stanley Common (9 & 10) and Mapperley (8 & 12). Round the villages is farmland, mainly grazing. Shipley Country Park has been established in the north east of the block (3,4,6,7, & 8) with opencast coalmining between Smalley and the Park (2). { {CONTENTS} { {SMALLEY}- Housing (2), Church (3), Baptist Church (3), School (4), Shops (4,5), Garage (5), Leisure (6), People (7,8), Conclusions (9). {STANLEY COMMON}- (10,11). {MAPPERLEY}- Village (12), School (12), Buildings (13), Reservoir and Land Use (14). {SHIPLEY COUNTRY PARK}- (15,16,17,18) {RON HASLAM}- a famous resident (19).
